questions.Q: How to list all the files in a directory?
questions.A: [f[2] for f in os.walk(directory) if len(f[2] > 0)]

questions.A:
from itertools import chain
c = list(itertools.chain(a,b))

questions.Q: How to sort a Python dict by value
questions.A:
sorted(myDic.items(), key=lambda x: x[1])
or
import operator
sorted(xs.items(), key=operator.itemgetter(1))
